text: Mangifera dongnaiensisPierre (1897) Fl. Forest. Cochinch. 21: s.p. is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is an endangered endemic tree found in Vietnam, where it is called xoài rừng. ==References== dongnaiensis Category:Endemic flora of Vietnam Category:Trees of Vietnam Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1897
title: Mangifera dongnaiensis
